role.argrole: entity opposed to - PP marked by مع

example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS كتبت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (PUNC :) (S (PUNC ") (VP (PSEUDO_VERB ان) (NP-SBJ-1 (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC قرار) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN اللجنة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN المركزية)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN_PROP ليكود))))) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يتناقض) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *-1)) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC مع) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN سياسة) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رئيس) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN الحكومة))))) (PP-TMP (PREP حتى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC الان)))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: with the policies of the Prime Minister
